title: Skia nyktos. = The shaddovv of night containing two poeticall hymnes, deuised by G.C. Gent.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed by R[ichard] F[ield] for William Ponsonby,
notes: First two words of title in Greek characters.
